name: Resident Evil 2 demake for Atari 2600
description:
Resident Evil 2 for Atari 2600 is a ROM usable on flash cart or can be run in an emulator such as Stella. Blast your way through Raccoon City as Leon S. Kennedy.

Directional pad moves character. 

Fire button uses weapon or selects inventory item

Inventory is selected holding SELECT button on console*

*inventory is accessed in emulation by holding the "m" key and press right to cycle thru items and guns. to use the first aid press down when item is highlighted in inventory.
